pplacer
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which pplacer installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using pplacer, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load pplacer/1.1.alpha19
```
